title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Applying Gamification Techniques to Social Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage (computer/tablet) and understanding of core social studies concepts (citizenship, rights, systems)
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course incorporating gamification elements to strengthen adult learners' educational motivation, aiming to develop problem-solving skills for social issues and critical thinking.

learning_goals: Learners can increase learner engagement by applying gamification principles (experience points, missions, rewards) to social inquiry education scenarios.
Learners can design activities that improve learner participation by 30% or more in civic rights and systems-related learning using digital quiz platforms.
Learners can establish a system to monitor individual learners' progress in cultural/historical topics at 80% or higher using classroom management tools (e.g., ClassDojo).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
